module: Module-level comment: The 'altera_jtag_dc_streaming' module handles JTAG data streaming in FPGA systems by synchronizing between system and JTAG clocks. It employs FIFOs for data management and utilizes 'altera_std_synchronizer', 'altera_jtag_streaming', 'altera_avalon_st_clock_crosser', and 'altera_jtag_src_crosser' to ensure controlled data transfer and signal synchronization across different clock domains, thus facilitating robust debug and management functionalities.
